Author: Tichy
Content: Although I wonder, what exactly is static content? I seem to remember the YouTubers having a problem with serving thumbnails. Finding a file on the file system and serving it is also a "dynamic action" in a way, or isn't it?

Author: danw
Title: Is this the biggest UK social network you've never heard of?

Author: Tichy
Content: I just envision selling "healthy dirt" in the drugstores ;-) Rub yourself into "safe dirt" in the morning and in the evening to avoid allergies...

Author: Tichy
Title: Watching faces on TV in the morning might cure depression

Author: Tichy
Content:
Interesting enough book, but I must admit, I was surprised at the low quality of most of the popular videos and YouTubers he links from the "book". Are these people making any money out of their YouTube fame? I guess with a little dedication (produce content in regular intervals), you can still get quite far on YouTube.

I feel reminded of "seeing faces on TV in the morning might help against depression": http://www.stat.columbia.edu/~cook/movabletype/archives/2007...

Basically the guy found out that seeing talking faces in the morning lifts his mood. Perhaps that is all there is to the YouTube blogging phenomenon: people have a need to see talking faces, no matter what the faces actually say.

Author: Tichy
Content: Don't know anything about it, but they probably have it's status in the bugtracker (Launchpad, I suppose)?
